name: Riddle Of Alexandria
description:
A cheeky small platformer developed for the Overly Sarcastic Productions Discord Server Game Jam. You play as "Little One" a small cloaked being in the library of Alexandria shortly before it burned down. A Sphinx has been cursed to block the exit so you collect a number of magical scrolls in order to understand and solve the binding riddle. 

Controls
A and D to move left/right
Space to jump (and double jump!)
Shift + W, A, S, and/or D to Dash
Left click to progress through dialogue
